title: How This $200k Backyard Pavilion Transformed A Family Home
description: Instead of creating a traditional extension for this Newcastle family home, Curious Practice proposed a budget-friendly alternative: a new studio built in the backyard. Taking inspiration from the simplicity of Japanese architecture, the plywood pavilion finds enough space for an additional living room, bedroom, bathroom and laundry â€” all tucked neatly into a 35-square-metre addition.
author: The Design Files
